name: savetexttofile
description: Saves highlighted text to a file in a specified directory
author: Robert Byrne

preferences.name: extensions.savetexttofile.showPreferences
preferences.title: Show preferences?
preferences.description: Open preferences dialog when 'Save Text to File' is clicked

preferences.name: extensions.savetexttofile.datestamp
preferences.title: Date stamp?
preferences.description: Add date to saved file name

preferences.name: extensions.savetexttofile.timestamp
preferences.title: Time stamp?
preferences.description: Add time to saved file name

preferences.name: extensions.savetexttofile.datestampInLine
preferences.title: Date stamp in line?
preferences.description: Add date to the beginning of saved text

preferences.name: extensions.savetexttofile.timestampInLine
preferences.title: Time stamp in line?
preferences.description: Add time to the beginning of saved text?

preferences.name: extensions.savetexttofile.lineSeparator
preferences.title: Line separator?
preferences.description: Add a line separator to the file before saved text
